nodes.text: Some time before 3626 BBY, Kira Carsen stole a ship to carry Jedi Master Satele Shan and her students when they were infected by Tenebrae's curse. Though Carsen initially wanted to acquire a corvette, Scourge valued the space provided by the carrier's many decks.
The ship was later assaulted by the Scions of Zakuul, the Servants of Tenebrae and the Republic's Task Force Nova, each seeking to destroy or assist Tenebrae.
